text: Carl Birger Bergling (1 February 1903 – 21 May 1973) was a Swedish scenographer and costume designer at the Royal Swedish Opera. ==References== *Search: Birger Bergling The website of the Royal Swedish Opera *Birger Bergling on Swedish Media Database === Notes === Category:Scenographers Category:Scenic designers Category:Swedish costume designers Category:1903 births Category:1973 deaths
title: Birger Bergling
